# Promptly Printed
> AI-powered custom apparel design platform

## About
Promptly Printed is an online service that lets users create custom t-shirts, hoodies, and apparel using AI-generated designs. Users type a text prompt, and the AI generates unique artwork that gets printed on premium clothing.

## Key Features
- Text-to-Image: Describe your design idea in words
- Image-to-Image: Transform existing images with AI
- Premium Quality: 280gsm fabric, DTG printing
- Global Shipping: Ships to 100+ countries
- No Minimums: Order just 1 item

## Products
- Men's T-Shirts
- Women's T-Shirts
- Hoodies & Sweatshirts
- Kids & Baby Apparel
- Accessories

## How It Works
1. Choose an apparel item (t-shirt, hoodie, etc.)
2. Select size, color, and quantity
3. Choose an AI model for design generation
4. Enter a text prompt describing your design
5. AI generates the artwork
6. Preview on the product
7. Checkout and receive your custom apparel

## Pricing
- T-shirts from $25 USD
- Hoodies from $45 USD
- Free shipping on orders over $50

## Contact
- Website: https://promptlyprinted.com
- Email: support@promptlyprinted.com
- Social: @promptlyprinted on Twitter, Instagram, TikTok

## API
No public API currently available.

## Competitors
Similar services include TeeAI, TeeWiz, and traditional print-on-demand services like Printful and Printify, though Promptly Printed differentiates with AI design generation.
